message.content:
cs.CY, cs.SI, cs.CR, cs.MM, cs.CL

The paper discusses the use of technology to spread false information, which falls under the category of cybersecurity (cs.CR) and multimedia (cs.MM). The paper also discusses the use of technical approaches to mitigate these issues, which falls under the category of computational social science (cs.SI) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Finally, the paper provides recommendations for technologists, researchers, platform designers, and policymakers, which falls under the category of cybernetics (cs.CY).
